title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a simple REST/CLI API with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client and asyncio bindings for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Terminal copilot that uses Ollama to suggest shell commands on demand.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Neovim plugin that swaps GitHub Copilot backend for a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative and embedding nodes.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in replacement for OpenAI Codex using CodeLlama served by Ollama.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component template that talks to Ollama via the REST API.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack with GPU support, Open-WebUI, and monitoring.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings and strong typing for the Ollama API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama with LINQ-style chat builders.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app that exposes Ollama models as async streaming views.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for private LLM queries.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for niche models.
